definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
celery wormwood (Artemisia carvifolia)/to give off/to weed

sentences.english: The further spread of resistance to artemisinins makes progress fragile.
sentences.chinese: 进一步蔓延的青蒿素耐药问题使进展变得脆弱。

sentences.english: After harvesting or collection, the artemisinin content of the leaves will gradually decrease.
sentences.chinese: 在收获或采收之后，叶中的青蒿素含量将逐步减少。

sentences.english: Artemisinin-based combination therapies, or ACTs, are our most effective antimalarial drugs.
sentences.chinese: 以青蒿素为基础的联合疗法是最有效的抗疟药。

sentences.english: Genes from the plant that control its yield of the antimalarial drug artemisinin have been identified by scientists.
sentences.chinese: 科学家发现了控制着植物的抗疟药青蒿素产量的基因。

sentences.english: Objective To induce a line of Plasmodium berghei with resistance to artemisinin.
sentences.chinese: 目的培育伯氏疟原虫青蒿素抗性系。

sentences.english: Currently in Africa, there are two first-line treatments with artesunate and other drugs.
sentences.chinese: 目前非洲，两个主要的治疗方法是青蒿素和其他药品。

sentences.english: In the early 1970s, a Project 523 team first isolated artemisinin from the plant. Clinical trials confirmed its antimalarial effects.
sentences.chinese: 临床试验证实了青蒿素的抗疟效果。

sentences.english: Artemisinin is extracted from the plant, Artemisia annua.
sentences.chinese: 青蒿素是从黄花蒿中提取出来的。

sentences.english: A second development is a partly synthetic version of artemisinin.
sentences.chinese: 第二个进展是部分人工合成的青蒿素。

sentences.english: Artemisinin derivatives are not inferior to quinine in preventing death in children with cerebral malaria.
sentences.chinese: 在防止脑型疟疾患儿死亡青蒿素衍生物并不次于奎宁。

sentences.english: Before, we were warning people that there could be an emergence of artemisinin resistance.
sentences.chinese: 此前，我们向人们警告对青蒿素的耐药性可能出现。

sentences.english: Artemisinin, given in combination with other drugs, is the most effective malaria treatment today.
sentences.chinese: 青蒿素和其他药物联合使用是如今最有效的疟疾疗法。

sentences.english: The company has been involved in re-engineering yeast to make artemisinin, the anti-malarial drug.
sentences.chinese: 该公司参与再造了酵母菌，以生产抗疟疾药青蒿素。

definition: Taxol (a.k.a. Paclitaxel), mitotic inhibitor used in cancer chemotherapy
